title: East coast NC has a history of moonshining. I have no idea of the outcome but recently a company in Scotland was redistilling Scotch Whisky claiming that people didn\'t get a hangover from their product whereas they did from the original product. Got me to wondering...While it is supposedly illegal to distill (even separate by freeze separating your own alcohol), is it legal to redistill alcohol you have already paid taxes on? I would delight in as full of a discussion as you have time for and watch the ABC folks tie themselves into pretzels!
